title.0: Nvidia CES 2023 live: will we see the rumored RTX 4070 Ti?
title.3: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX GPU proves mixed bag for content creators
title.4: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT / XTX review: 4K performance for less
title.5: Nvidia makes the RTX 4070 Ti official for $100 less than the canceled 12GB 4080
title.6: A quick look at AMD’s Radeon RX 7900 XTX, which is smaller than an RTX 4080

description.0: Nvidia is at CES 2023 and our live blog will bring you all of the big announcements as they come! Will we see the RTX 4070 Ti?
description.1: How did Nvidia fare over the past year? Strap yourself in tight, because the ride’s a bumpy one…
description.2: While not perfect, the AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX is still the enthusiast graphics card that matches the moment.
description.3: The AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX GPU has been benchmarked - and the results make grim reading for content creators.
description.4: AMD is back with new RDNA 3 GPUs to take on Nvidia’s RTX 40-series. The Radeon RX 7900 XTX manages to beat Nvidia’s RTX 4080, all at $200 less.
description.5: Specs and performance are identical to Nvidia's "unlaunched" 4080 variant.
description.6: We can't talk about performance yet, but these GPUs should fit in most PC cases.
